ComicInfo.Summary:
The Merc With A Mouth will never shut upâ€¦even when he's on a variant cover! Check out your favorite fourth-wall-breaking anti-hero as he graces a gallery of variant covers from mind-melting artists including Leinil Yu, Greg Land, Elizabeth Torque and many more!
*Contents* Siege #3 (J. Scott Campbell & Christina Strain) Wolverine #1 (J. Scott Campbell & Christina Strain) Uncanny Avengers #1 (Mark Brooks) Avengers #1 (Mark Brooks, Dustin Weaver & Justin Ponsor) Guardians of the Galaxy #1 (Phil Jimenez, Frank D'Armata, Steve McNiven & Justin Ponsor) Super Spider-Man Team-Up #1 (Terry Dodson, Rachel Dodson & Paolo Rivera) Infinity #1 (Mark Brooks, Adam Kubert, Dave Meikis & Laura Martin) Mighty Avengers #1 (Carlo Barberi, Edgar Delgado, Greg Land & Guru-eFX) Iron Man #23.Now (Leonard Kirk & Jesus Aburtov) Original Sin #1 (Ben Caldwell) Original Sin #1 (Chip Zdarsky) Original Sin #1 (Chip Zdarsky) Death of Wolverine #1
